message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds significant value to me, but I understand its worth to you lies at $12,000. Considering the unique features and the quality of this product, I propose a fair deal. I would like to offer it to you for $14,000. This price reflects a reasonable compromise while ensuring a satisfactory return for my investment. I believe this opportunity aligns well with both our interests. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you need further information to make a decision.
